metadata.name: KHUDA
metadata.description:
Khuda is a highly detailed 3D mandala inspired by the real-life events of humanity and is a true testament to the power of art.

The word "Khuda" translates to "God" in Urdu, and this piece is a celebration of the divine forces that guide and shape our world.

From the intricate patterns to the rich colours, every aspect of this piece has been carefully crafted to capture the essence of humanity's triumphs and struggles.

The mandala symbolises the cyclical nature of life, and "Khuda" is a visual representation of our journey through the ups and downs of existence.

As an artist, it is my hope that this piece will spark conversations and evoke emotions, reminding us all of the beauty and complexity of the human experience.

"Khuda" is now available for purchase.
